name: Crazy siege
description:
This is an immersive shooting game.

The player plays a soldier

When you wake up from a dream

You find a lot of monsters outside the door

But, careless you

I left all my weapons outside the door yesterday

What should I do?

Look for opportunities, pick up weapons, kill zombies

Content and play

- player operators fight zombies

- a wide range of weapons

-Diverse zombies

-Explore the vast map

Features of the game:

- first person real exciting way of playing.

- intense and terrifying atmosphere of the game.
